comprehensive_overview: r-maptools is an R package that provides various tools for reading and handling spatial data in R. It offers functions to read, write, and manipulate spatial data formats commonly used in geographic information systems (GIS).
core_features: Read and write spatial data in various formats (Shapefiles, KML, GeoJSON, etc.)
Perform spatial data manipulations and transformations
Overlay spatial data layers and conduct spatial operations
Visualize spatial data and create maps
